title: Game didn't connect will i be banned?
body: ok so the game wouldn't load so i came onto the forums to see whats up it seems to have happened to a lot of people i reload LoL look at a few posts seems like the game actually started and im wondering will i get banned because of this crap?

replies.body:
I asked riot about your case and allegedly, they're contemplating a permanent ban on your account.
Best of wishes friend!

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sfVvZh5J,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-06T08:15:26.750+0000)
>
> I asked riot about your case and allegedly, they're contemplating a permanent ban on your account.
> Best of wishes friend!

Sounds justified.

I got a similar situation, the game held me in champion select for 10 minutes (on an aram game) and i eventually managed to re-connect after re-starting the game ect. ect. and i played the rest of the game, and in the post game screen i got a leaver buster warning....
This has happened before and I don't recall anyone crying that it got them penalties, so nope.
No don't worry about bans for this circumstance. If it is server wide, then Riot won't ban people for problems on their end.
